body_html:
@mrry Hi Derek, would you mind to ping me if there is any changes to merge in contrib/gdr directory next time? I am currently working with Paul to refactor gdr (and other extensions to distributed_runtime/grpc) to a separate repo in SIG-Networking, so it is better that I could sync those changes on both side.

Thanks :)
body_text:

Thanks :)
body:
@mrry Hi Derek, would you mind to ping me if there is any changes to merge in contrib/gdr directory next time? I am currently working with Paul to refactor gdr (and other extensions to distributed_runtime/grpc) to a separate repo in SIG-Networking, so it is better that I could sync those changes on both side.

Thanks :)
